Package org.jastronomy.jsofa

Class JSOFA.Astrom

java.lang.Object
org.jastronomy.jsofa.JSOFA.Astrom
Enclosing class:
JSOFA
public static class JSOFA.Astrom extends Object
Star-independent astrometry parameters. (Vectors eb, eh, em and v are all with respect to BCRS axes.)
Since:
20131202
Author:
Paul Harrison (paul.harrison@manchester.ac.uk) 26 Mar 2014
